description.en: QZKCoin is a peer-to-peer (P2P) cryptocurrency based on the fintech organization, acquired by Qazeek Pay. QZKCoin is changing the way that how people think about money. QZKCoin is stored, received, and sent by using payment gateway which is known as Qazeek Pay. QZKCoin makes it easy for users to send real money quickly from anywhere in the world. It can also be used to make purchases from a variety of online retailers. QZKCoin wallet is a safe, secure, and advanced distributed system architecture built to protect against DDoS and other security threats. In this world, more than 98% of digital assets are stored in multi-signature, cold wallets.
